channel.description: Week 1 Announcements Russell Feldhausen Pronouns: he/him (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2213 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Email Preferred The Course Gated Modules on Canvas 1 Module Every Other Week Check Due Dates Lab Assignment - Live Grading Discussions - Video & Questions Final Project Communication Discord - Course Questions, Discussions, etc Email - Personal Issues, Grading Questions, To-dos, etc Email is official, Discord is more flexible Success Growth Mindset Don't just read/watch, engage Work Iteratively Save Early & Often Ask for Help Lab Grading Schedule via Calendly Can Schedule Before Complete Requires 4 hours notice Zoom with Screen Share Cannot Change Once Started Discussions Recorded Summer 2021 Watch Video & Write Reaction Questions?
